name: Vidulum
description: Vidulum is a device agnostic, self custody, multi-coin crypto web wallet. Users of Vidulum App can access their crypto from any device, anywhere in the world through the app available on Android and iOS devices or through modern web browsers at https://wallet.vidulum.app. VDL is the native blockchain for the app and powers the internal rewards system and offers utility in the application. V-Staking is the primary reward utility at present where holders of certain coins can earn VDL. VDL is a delegated proof of stake blockchain. Users can participate in consensus directly in Vidulum App to earn more VDL crypto by delegating/staking with a network validator.
